title: Fitted Kitchen/Island, Neff Appliances, Elica Extractor, Hot Tap & Quartz Tops
description: Complete kitchen unit set, featuring a sleek and modern design available for collection before or around 2nd June, having been removed by professional kitchen fitters. The ensemble comprises white cabinets made from MDF, in good, used condition, complemented by a black quartz worktop. Crafted to meet the demands of a bustling culinary area, each unit is designed for convenience and ease of use.   This white colour scheme brings a bright and clean aesthetic, making it a perfect match for any kitchen decor or style. This set includes appliances such as Neff hide/slide ovens, steam oven, induction hob, Microwave, fridge and freezer. The sink with hot tap and crystal glass light extractor fan are also included, but the dishwasher is not, just the door and housing for buyer to provide their own preference of appliance.  There is a granite seating area in the window with large deep drawers below for additional storage. The large island is fitted with a central induction hob for cooking, there is ample storage with drawers and cupboards on either side. The curved end even has curved doors with storage behind. An over-hang provides a place for bar stools, ideal as a breakfast bar.   Elica INTERSTELLAR-C 67cm Island Cooker Hood retails at ¬£3,369 which is included in the sale.  Enhance the look of your kitchen with this elegant island cooker hood from Elica. The Island model is designed to fit perfectly in your kitchen layout and provide efficient ventilation while you cook. It comes with a chimney design and LED light to create a warm and inviting atmosphere while cooking.  This cooker hood is made by Elica, a trusted brand in the industry. It features an aluminium grease filter that makes cleaning easy and hassle-free. The hood is suitable for island or ceiling-mounted installation and has a sleek silver colour that complements any kitchen d√©cor. Upgrade your kitchen with the Elica Star Extracor Island Cooker Hood.   All of the appliances are in good working order.   The black quartz work surfaces on the huge island and sink run, plus the window seating area, are all in excellent condition and are included in the sale.   See kitchen plan for measurements.   Island:287cm L x 129cm W x 90H  Sink run:540cm L x 60cm D x 211cm H x 90cm Counter top   Note:There is some natural wear/tear on some units, these areas can be changed for new pieces of MDF on the carcasses and a drawer front has some damage. description: Enhance your home with this magnificent Victorian cast iron fireplace, featuring intricate detailing and timeless craftsmanship. The ornate cast iron surround showcases elegant floral and geometric patterns, adding a touch of historical charm to any space.  This fireplace includes a Broseley ‚ÄòWinchester‚Äô solid wood-burning stove, offering both warmth and style. Included is a decorative fireguard seat ledge to perch upon,  which adds an extra layer of safety while complementing the overall aesthetic. The seat is upholstered in a quality plum coloured velvet.  The rich graphite dark grey finish to the surround pairs beautifully with classic and contemporary interiors alike.  A rare and striking centerpiece, this Victorian fireplace is perfect for period properties or anyone looking to add character to their home.  Description of log burner:  The Broseley Winchester wood burning stove incorporates unique side viewing windows so the beauty and warmth of the fire can be seen and felt from all aspects of your living room.  Incorporating highly controllable primary and secondary air-wash features together with a large firebox to accommodate even larger logs the Winchester offers heat outputs of up to 8kw/hr.
